zone.line: like mournful music speak not so My fa
he is blind.
The strangers eyes were suddenly filled
with tears & the lines of his countenance
became
relaxed with tears. Blind?" he exclaimed in
a tone of suffering which was more than
seated himself apart on
an apology & withdrew to a flight of shattered
& mossy stairs which wound up among the
labyrinths of the ruin
My sweet Helen — said the old man you
did not tell me that this was the Coliseum
How should I tell you dearest father what
I knew not. I was on the point of
the sun warm wind asking enquiring the way
to that building when we entered the this
circle of these ruins, & until the stranger
accosted us I remained silent, subdued by
the grandeur greatness of what I see
